name: Demigrant Paint Battle
description:
A local multiplayer arena where you have to push your enemy to the flames.

Challenges:

  • Make all your sound effect by saying stuff into a mic. onomatopoeia recommended
  • Use only comic sans for any in-game font
  • Draw your assets without a drawing tablet
  • (Almost) Only use the paint color palette. no choosing other colors

For the future:

  • Gamepad support
  • Music!
  • Selectable characters
  • Multiplayer online

Ctrl + W problem fixed (Thanks to @feistycrabstudios).
